title.narrative: Increasing youth employment in Ethiopia by re-shaping the vocational training model together with companies from the water and textiles sectors

description.narrative: The Development Engagement responds to key Danida priority issues, including the provision of quality and demand-responsive skills development while making sure that this provision leads to sustainable employment opportunities. The DE addresses both TVET system capacity development as well as improved linkages with private business through job placements and apprenticeships within the water and textile sectors. The objective of the DE will be achieved through three outcomes: 1) Strengthened and redesigned capacity of 2 TVET Centers to better facilitate employment, 2) Young men and women get the skills, knowledge and support to access decent employment opportunities, and 3) The young TVET graduates are linked to decent employment and entrepreneurship opportunities.
